title: All-Purpose Negi (Scallion) Oil

ingredients.name: scallion whites (one bunch, trimmed of ends)

steps: In a small saucepan, add the oil and scallions.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally until the scallions take on a light golden hue and smell fragrant, around 10-15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, reserve in the pot and allow it to cool.
Strain and transfer oil to a heat-resistant container.
If not used immediately, store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
notes: This is an easy introduction to aroma oil if you're new to the process.
Versatile for several ramen styles, works on lighter bowls and more rich ones.
Can be used in many other dishes: fried rice, searing chicken, tossed with salad.
125 mL is approximately 0.5 cup, converted to approximately 113 grams (oils are less dense than water, approximately 0.9 g/mL).
Store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
